content:
Really? Should I pick up a branch for you next time?
Just kidding,
When it's for a friend, I'll only give what I think is the best.
info: NPC事件模板1-给玩家送礼物-0保底_1-给玩家送礼物

content: Thanks, what a mysterious gift!

content: Will it bring me good fortune?

Ugh... <size=28>why did I suddenly get so dramatic?</size>{短暂停}
